mapper.select:
select a.title, a.replycnt, c.lat, c.lng, c.liked, c.cno from court c natural join article a where c.approval = 'Y'
order by c.cno desc limit #{pageidx}, 10

sql.if: and c.lat between #{swlat} and #{nelat} and c.lng between #{swlng} and #{nelng}

mapper.select: select * from court natural join article where approval = 'Y' and cno = #{cno}
mapper.insert: insert into court(bno, ano, address, lat, lng, approval) values(#{bno}, #{ano}, #{address}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.update: update court set liked = liked + 1 where bno = #{bno} and ano = #{ano}
mapper.select: select mname, DATE_FORMAT(begintime, '%m/%d %h:%i %p') begintime, DATE_FORMAT(endtime, '%m/%d %h:%i %p') endtime, state from match_court where mno = #{mno}

select m.mno, m.mname, DATE_FORMAT(m.begintime, '%m/%d %h:%i %p') begintime, DATE_FORMAT(m.endtime, '%m/%d %h:%i %p') endtime, m.cno, m.state, c.lat, c.lng from match_court m natural join court c where m.cno > 0
order by m.mno desc limit #{pageidx}, 10

sql.if: and c.lat between #{swlat} and #{nelat} and c.lng between #{swlng} and #{nelng}

mapper.update: update match_court set state = '시작' where state = '대기' and begintime <= now()
update match_court set state = '진행' where state = '시작' and begintime + INTERVAL 3 day_minute < now()
update match_court set state = '평가' where state = '진행' and endtime < now()
update match_court set state = '종료' where state = '평가' and endtime + INTERVAL 3 day_minute < now()
mapper.select: select id, role, state from match_player where mno = #{mno} and team = #{team}
mapper.update: update match_player set state = '참가' where id = #{id} and mno = #{mno}
update match_player set state = '종료' where id = #{id} and mno = #{mno}
update match_result set point = point + #{point}, trust = trust + #{trust} where mno = #{mno} and id = #{id}
